A3JGroups

Class JGFollowerRole

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
      • A3JGroups.JGFollowerRole
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, org.jgroups.MembershipListener, org.jgroups.MessageListener, org.jgroups.Receiver

    public abstract class JGFollowerRole
extends org.jgroups.ReceiverAdapter
implements java.lang.Runnable
    JGFollowerRole must be extended in order to define a certain type of follower. You must define the behavior of each follower implementing the run function. A followerRole can be used in more than one group, and different role can be used in the same group. In each group there are more follower that work with a supervisor.
    Author:
    bett.marco88@gmail.com
